Format Label with Post-Processing

Source: R/label_utils.R
format_label.Rd

Apply formatting transformations to a label.

Usage

format_label(
  label,
  sep = " ",
  case = "original",
  remove_articles = FALSE,
  remove_prepositions = FALSE,
  max_chars = NULL,
  abbreviate = FALSE,
  max_words = NULL
)

Arguments

label

Character. Original label text

sep

Character. Separator between words

case

Character. Case transformation to apply

remove_articles

Logical. Remove articles (a, an, the)

remove_prepositions

Logical. Remove prepositions

max_chars

Integer or NULL. Maximum character length

abbreviate

Logical. Apply rule-based abbreviation

max_words

Integer or NULL. Maximum word count

Value

Character. Formatted label

On this page
